name: bj-spimevv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Version of ~ spimev with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
